CardData.FlavorText: <line-height=100%><indent=50>Y</indent>our foes throw themselves at you in a never-ending assault. How can even a tower of this size can contain so many orcs?! Still, you haven't come so far to fail now. With strength of will to match the steel of your weapons, you stand fast against your enemies.

Localization.Title: Make a Stand
Localization.Text: Gain +1 <size=120%><sprite=3></size> for each Ally in play
